api.title: ENG-1725 - Automatic report retry with email notifications
Allow Qumis.ai Domain Users to Sign Up Without Approval or Slack Notifications
fix: seed localdev user as exempt with verified email to bypass pricing page

features.title: Automatic Report Retry with Email Notifications
features.description: Failed reports are now automatically retried up to 3 times with configurable delays. Users receive branded email notifications when their report is ready or when it permanently fails after all retries.
details: Automatic retry of failed reports with exponential backoff via Sidekiq scheduled jobs
New TemplateMailer system for branded, API-stored email templates with HTML and plain-text variants
Report-ready and report-failed email notifications sent to the requesting user
Original error message tracking on job_report_email_requests for debugging
support@qumis.ai CC'd on all template emails by default

improvements.title: Qumis domain signup bypass
improvements.description: Users with @qumis.ai email addresses can now sign up without manual approval or Slack notifications, streamlining internal onboarding

improvements.title: Dev seed improvements
improvements.description: Local development seed user is now set as exempt with verified email to bypass the pricing page during development
